section.p: The process of cleaning a wound or body organ by flushing or washing out with water or a medicated solution

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] irrigationType with data type Code
Identifies the type of solution used for irrigation during the operative procedure.

Contains exactly one [1..1] timeIrrigation with data type Point In Time
Contains the date and time that the irrigation solution was utilized.

Contains at least one [1..*] evalutation, where its type is Irrigation Evaluation
Contains the type of irrigation fluid that is being observed for evaluation.

Contains exactly one [1..1] irrigationType with data type Code
Identifies the type of solution used for irrigation during the operative procedure.

Contains exactly one [1..1] timeIrrigation with data type Point In Time
Contains the date and time that the irrigation solution was utilized.

Contains at least one [1..*] evalutation, where its type is Irrigation Evaluation
Contains the type of irrigation fluid that is being observed for evaluation.
